location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The map shows the location proposed by the Kuwait Oil Company for a new aerodrome in Kuwait near Fort Mushirif [Qaşr Mushrif]. It shows the position of the proposed airstrip in relation to Kuwait town, Fanaitis [Al Funayţīs], and Fantas [Al Finţās]. It also includes distance arrows indicating the distance between the proposed airstrip to Magwa [Al Maqwa‘] and Ahmadi [Al Aḩmadī].It is noted as having been created by the Kuwait Company Limited, 1 Great Cumberland Place, London W1.
